identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Swiss precision with Electric AI aesthetics.
Emotion First: Every pixel must serve the 'Neuromarketing' goal.
Content is King: The ad content is the hero; the UI is the stage.
Zoom In: Bold focus on details.
Contrast: High contrast for authority and clarity.

typography.instructions: Use 'Manrope' for English text and 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic' for Arabic text. Ensure proper fallback. Do NOT use Inter.

layout.spacing_system: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Containers with borders MUST have internal padding.

grid_system.dashboard: Mode B: Control Room Grid (Dense, Functional)

layout.rtl_strategy: CRITICAL: Use logical properties. 'ms-' (margin-start) instead of 'ml-'. 'me-' (margin-end) instead of 'mr-'. Ensure 'dir=rtl' is set on the body when Arabic is selected.
layout.mobile_first: Design for 375px width first. No hover effects. Touch targets min 44px.

components.buttons: Pill-shaped or Sharp. NO default rounded-md. High contrast. Active state: scale-95.
components.cards: Flat or subtle border. No heavy shadows. 'Tracing Beam' effect for active selection.
components.inputs: High height (h-12 or h-14) for easy tapping. Text size 16px to prevent auto-zoom on iOS.
components.wizard: Step progress bar at top. 'Next' button fixed at bottom or prominent. Back button visible.
components.gallery: Masonry or Bento grid for generated images.

images.description: Neon abstract interface, good for hero background or AI processing states.
Creative team brainstorming, good for 'About' or 'How it works'.
Diverse group working, represents the target audience.

assets.logo_placeholder: Use text logo with 'Manrope' font, bold weight, tracking-tighter.

motion.policy: NO HOVER EFFECTS for functionality. Use tap/active states.

accessibility.rtl: Full RTL support required. Test with Arabic content.

universal_guidelines: Do NOT use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Every interaction needs micro-animations (tap, focus, entrance).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include 'data-testid' attribute.
instructions_to_main_agent: 1. Implement the 'Manrope' and 'IBM Plex Sans Arabic' fonts immediately. 2. Set up the Tailwind config to support RTL (tailwindcss-rtl plugin or logical properties). 3. Build the Wizard component as the core feature. 4. Use the provided image URLs for the landing page. 5. Ensure the 'Psychological Strategy' selector is visual and engaging, not just a dropdown.
